entered above his right eye and exited above his left eye and he was immediately rendered

into the helicopter. He instinctively put himself in harm's way and returned fire until all personnel
were on board the helicopter. As the helicopter took off, Special Agent Vanderbilt, Johnson and
Harris immediately rendered first aid to Special Agent Porsante and controlled his bleeding,
maintained an open airway, and stabilized him. Special Agent Porsante was eventually transferred
to the Veterans Affairs Medical Center in Richmond, Virginia for continued treatment and rehabilitation.
